```{r}
a <- cattle_sales_census %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0) %>% 
  mutate(
    total_heads_sold = heads_sold_small 
    + heads_sold_big_breed
    + heads_sold_big_finish
    + heads_sold_big_slaughter,
    
    total_sales_value = sales_value_small 
    + sales_value_big_breed
    + sales_value_big_finish
    + sales_value_big_slaughter,
    
    average_price = total_sales_value/total_heads_sold
  ) %>% 
  drop_na(average_price)

```

```{r}
print("all")
summary(a$average_price)
```


```{r}
print("no finish")

```

```

```


```{r}
a %>% 
  ggplot(., aes(x = average_price)) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "lightblue", color = "black", bins = 30) +
  labs(title = "Histogram of Data", x = "Values", y = "Frequency")
```
